name: Go! Sports Skydiving
description:
Go! Sports Skydiving™ is a skydiving simulator that uses the SIXAXIS™ wireless controller to twist, turn and pull off tricks. The easy and intuitive motion control allows you to move through the skies into various skydiving team formations or solo tricks with the greatest of ease. Supports several single player modes, including formation, team match, landing and several online battle modes. Other online features include competing against other players in formation and team matches, as well a global ranking system for the formation and landing modes.

Key Features:
• Various Gameplay Modes – Includes 4 offline modes, a license mode and 2 online modes with up to 4 players.
• SIXAXIS™ wireless controller - Fully controlled by the SIXAXIS™ motion sensors to maneuver your skydiver into various formations.
• Download Replays – Watch the replays of the highest ranked players on the leaderboards.
• Global Online Ranking – See how you compare to other skydivers.
 
Go! Sports Skydiving is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc. Developed by Lightweight Co., Ltd. © 2007 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
